articleTitleTranslated: Top stars at the ATP Cup again

articleContentTranslated: Thiem, number three in the world, will play his only matches at the ATP Cup before the Australian Open, which starts on February 8th. Last year Thiem and Co. missed the quarter-finals at the premiere of this competition in Sydney after losing to Poland.

Dennis Novak is again the second single player, the doubles will be played by Philipp Oswald and Tristan-Samuel Weissborn. The line-up is first class in the week before the first Grand Slam tournament of the year, with 14 players from the top 15 of the ATP rankings named.

On January 20th, the twelve teams will be drawn into four groups, the first of which will contest the semifinals. The organizers came under a little pressure in advance because they had to look for a new hotel for this phase. Apartment owners in the Hotel Westin, in which Djokovic, Nadal, Thiem and Co. were supposed to stay for these two weeks, lay back.
They pointed to what they considered to be an unacceptable health risk and threatened a lawsuit. According to a statement on Tuesday, the organizers have found a replacement.
